title: Service Fabric REST API Reference and Authentication
body: Service Fabric cluster API reference for https://sfjagilber1nt5c.centralus.cloudapp.azure.com:19080. Authentication requires client certificate CN=sfjagilber from CurrentUser\My certificate store. Key working endpoints: GET /$/GetClusterHealth (cluster health), GET /Applications (list apps), GET /Nodes (list nodes). All endpoints require ?api-version=6.0 parameter. Cluster has 5 healthy nodes (_nodetype0_0 through _nodetype0_4) running Service Fabric 11.1.208.1. Complete API includes cluster management, node operations, application lifecycle, service management, partition/replica operations, backup/restore, infrastructure commands, events/monitoring, and compose/mesh deployments. PowerShell authentication pattern: Get certificate, create HttpWebRequest, add ClientCertificates, set timeout/headers, execute request. Current cluster status: healthy, no user applications deployed.
semanticSummary: Service Fabric cluster API reference for https://sfjagilber1nt5c.centralus.cloudapp.azure.com:19080. Authentication requires client certificate CN=sfjagilber...
